Subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Re: Example program?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=563108510
From: "Simpson, Robby (GE Energy Management)" <robby.simpson@...>

Hi Dan,

A standard that I chaired that I believe sticks very close to REST=
ful principles is IEEE 2030.5 (Smart Energy Profile 2.0).  It is freely ava=
ilable at http://www.zigbee.org/Standards/ZigBeeSmartEnergy/ZigBeeSmartEner=
gy20Standard.aspx and also available from the IEEE website.

In terms of bo=
oks with good examples, I'm a big fan of:
"RESTful Web APIs" by Leonard Ric=
hardson, Mike Amundsen, and Sam Ruby (http://shop.oreilly.com/product/06369=
20028468.do)
And its predecessor:
"RESTful Web Services" by Leonard Richard=
son and Sam Ruby (http://shop.oreilly.com/product/9780596529260.do) which i=
s now freely available at http://restfulwebapis.org/rws.html

Please let me=
 know if there is anything that I can do to help.

Thanks,
Robby


Robby Si=
mpson, PhD

System Architect

GE

Digital Energy
